title: Word Counter
description: An interactive MicroSim where kindergarten students count words in sentences by tapping once per word, developing the concept of word and one-to-one correspondence.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Phonemic Awareness
Concept of Word
learningObjectives: Understand that sentences are made of individual words
Develop one-to-one correspondence between spoken and written words
Identify word boundaries in continuous speech

controls.label: Hear Sentence
controls.description: Speak the current sentence using speech synthesis

controls.label: Check
controls.description: Check if the tap count matches the word count

controls.label: New
controls.description: Load a new random sentence to count

controls.label: Difficulty
controls.description: Filter sentences by word count (2, 3, 4, 5, or all)

assumptions: User has mouse or touchscreen input
Browser supports Web Speech API for audio
limitations: Young children may count syllables instead of words
Connected speech makes word boundaries less obvious
Contractions and compound words may confuse learners
